Package dev.schoolmanagement.service

Interface StudentService

All Superinterfaces:
BaseService<StudentDTO>
All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentServiceImpl
public interface StudentService extends BaseService<StudentDTO>
Base interface for CRUD operations on Student data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StudentDTO
    enrollCourse​(Long studentId, Long courseId)
    Gets the associated entities from database by using their ID's, then sets the found Course entities students field by using its CourseDTO.addStudents(Student) method.

    Methods inherited from interface dev.schoolmanagement.service.BaseService

    deleteById, findAll, findById, save, update

  • Method Details

    • enrollCourse

      StudentDTO enrollCourse​(Long studentId, Long courseId)
      Gets the associated entities from database by using their ID's, then sets the found Course entities students field by using its CourseDTO.addStudents(Student) method. After that persist the updated Course object back. If one of the give ID's fail to match a entry at database level, throws EntityNotFoundException.
      Parameters:
      studentId - of the enrolled student.
      courseId - of the target course.
      Returns:
      the updated data.
